=======
History
=======

0.2.4 (2021-04-20)
------------------

* Added support for constant and fixed 'Parser' has no attribute 'state' error 
* Added support for inputing values into arrays, e.g. input myarr[10]


0.2.1 (2021-04-13)
------------------

* Fixed bug in function calls.


0.1.9 (2021-04-09)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
